column1: Fatehganj Pashchimi (or Fatehganj West) is a town and a nagar panchayat in Bareilly district in the state of Uttar Pradesh

column2: Fatehganj Pashchimi had a population of 20
column3: 811. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Fatehganj Pashchimi has an average literacy rate of 67%
column4: higher than the national average of 64%: male literacy is 74%
column5: and female literacy is 59%. In Fatehganj Pashchimi
column6: 10% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: Fatehganj Pashchimi is situated on NH 24
column3: about 27 kilometres (17 mi) northwest of Bareilly city. The area nearby produces mentha
column4: sugar and rice. There are many agro-based industries located there.
